entities.name: silver doe
entities.description: The Silver Doe is mentioned as a mysterious entity that has left its sword in the pool.

entities.name: oaks
entities.description: Two oaks are described as growing together with a gap between their trunks.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is mentioned as waiting and holding the sword and Horcrux.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is mentioned as walking back to Ron, looking at the sword, and discussing its origin.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione's wand is used to provide light for the group.

entities.name: patronus
entities.description: The Patronus is mentioned as a spell that must have been cast by someone.

entities.name: horcrux
entities.description: The Horcrux is described as a locket that is twitching and has a presence inside it.

entities.name: sword
entities.description: The sword is mentioned as being in the pool and having a rubied hilt.

relationships.description: Harry sees the sword in the pool.
The Patronus must have been cast by someone who put the sword in the pool.
The presence inside the Horcrux has tried to kill Harry.
Hermione's wand provides light for the group.
